name: Kirifuda Blitz
description:
Instructions
Click or touch to drag cards to the lock-in area. Defeat the opponent by capturing their King!

Each player has:
4x Pawn (lvl. 1)
2x Cavalier (lvl. 2)
2x Magus (lvl. 3)
1x Judge (lvl. 4)
1x Queen (lvl. 0)
1x King (lvl. 5)
1x Kirifuda (lvl. ∞)

Rules

The winning cards are returned to the player while the losing cards disappear.

The Kirifuda defeats all cards but can only be used once.

Kings can only be defeated by a Queen or Kirifuda.

The Cavalier and Magus earn a star each time they defeat a card. Earning 3 stars promotes that Cavalier or Magus into a Judge. Limit one promotion per player.

If a Queen or Kirifuda ties, they are returned to the players.

In the event of a stalemate (Kings tie), the player with more pieces left, wins. The Kirifuda and Queen are not counted.
